entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 02:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
